div.p: This profile expands adds additional constraints and extensions to the base SDC questionnaire profile that support generating and potentially partially populating a questionnaire response using existing FHIR resource data. This profile identifies which core elements and extensions must be supported and highlights other elements that, while not required, may be relevant to the questionnaire response population use-case. Further information on how this use-case is implemented as well as guidance on on the elements and extensions included in the profile can be found on the Questionnaire Population page.
